attributes.action: Give the English home rule in their own country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Scottish,Welsh MPs imposing unwanted laws on the English. The current government should remember that it was elected by only 1 in 5 of the electorate and lost the overall vote in England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
